ygData.subject: tanks that don't listen to there healers
ygData.msgSnippet: Well its me again, that faithful dark elf healer. A couple of days ago i was hunting in dalnir. A great lvling place for a lvl 26. And my puller pulled a
ygData.messageBody:
Well its me again, that faithful dark elf healer.
A couple of days ago i was hunting in dalnir. A
great lvling place for a lvl 26. And my puller pulled a
trian. Thats ok but what they didn't do is help
me.<br><br> For those that don't know when a cleric heals the
tank all the free npcs are agroed by the heal and im
attacked. <br><br> I died from this 3 times before i
disbanded the group and made another one. I'm just venting
steam. I'm tired of tanks not helping out there clerics.
we can't cast when attacked. so i don't see why a
tank would not drop what he was doing and save his
clerics behind. <br><br> I knwo what you thinking there
ane also clerics that try to tank and don't heal.
i've grouped with these and always try to help them.
Teach them how to be a good ckeric. if they don't learn
they leave the party. My ranger knows too well about
healers that don't heal. <br><br> I know i sound harsh
but yes I am venting. well this
is<br><br><br>Fefelafuw signing off.
